c play_music_loop(game_music) } load_scene(name) }

Sound with Cooldown

shoot_sound = none
shoot_cooldown = 0

function on_start() {
    shoot_sound = load_sound("sounds/shoot.wav")
}


function on_update(dt) {
    shoot_cooldown = shoot_cooldown - dt


if mouse_down(MOUSE_LEFT) and shoot_cooldown <= 0 {
        shoot()
        play_sound(shoot_sound)
        shoot_cooldown = 0.1  // 100ms between sounds
    }
}

Randomized Sounds

hit_sounds = []

function on_start() {
    push(hit_sounds, load_sound("sounds/hit1.wav"))
    push(hit_sounds, load_sound("sounds/hit2.wav"))
    push(hit_sounds, load_sound("sounds/hit3.wav"))
}


function play_hit_sound() {
    index = floor(random() * len(hit_sounds))
    play_sound(hit_sounds[index])
}

Supported Formats

FormatExtensionNotes
WAV.wavUncompressed, best for short sounds
OGG Vorbis.oggCompressed, good for music
MP3.mp3Compressed, widely supported

Best Practices

  • Load audio in on_start(): Loading files takes time, do it once at startup
  • Use WAV for sound effects: Lower latency for short sounds
  • Use OGG for music: Good compression for longer tracks
  • Set reasonable volumes: Start at 0.7-0.8 to leave headroom
  • Handle missing files: The game continues if audio fails to load
